articles.title: San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club Planning Meeting on July 20, 1969
articles.summary: The San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club held planning meetings from July to December 1964, discussing various topics such as Morrison Lectures, astronomical equipment, and programs for upcoming meetings. The club also planned for a star-party campsite selection and discussed the possibility of radio astronomy lectures.

articles.title: San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club Planning Meeting on August 17, 1964
articles.summary: The San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club held planning meetings in August and October 1964 to discuss upcoming events, speakers, and topics. The club planned to host a Morrison Lecture by Dr. David Cudaback on radio astronomy.

articles.title: Planning Meeting for San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club on August 31, 1964
articles.summary: The San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club plans meetings and programs for the year 1964-1965, including a Morrison Lecture by Dr. David Cudaback on radio astronomy. The club discusses various topics such as astronomical photography, star-party campsites, and publicity efforts.

articles.title: San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club Planning Meeting on September 21, 1964
articles.summary: The San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club held a planning meeting on September 21, 1964, at John Lewellyn's house. Members discussed upcoming events, including the WAA Convention and a meeting at the Rose Garden Branch Library. The club also discussed college astronomical equipment.

articles.title: San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club Planning Meeting on October 12, 1964
articles.summary: The San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club held a planning meeting on October 12, 1964, to discuss upcoming events and programs. The meeting was attended by several members, including Walt Krumm and Ralph Plankinton. The club is also considering inviting Dr. John Phillips from the University of California at Berkeley to give a lecture.

articles.title: Letter from University of California, Berkeley Astronomy Department
articles.summary: The University of California, Berkeley Astronomy Department is recommending Dr. David Cudaback to present a Morrison Lecture to the San Jose Amateur Astronomers on December 7, focusing on radio astronomy and the lunar surface.

articles.title: San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club Planning Meeting on November 16, 1964
articles.summary: The San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club held a planning meeting on November 16, 1964, at Elmer Johnson's house to discuss various club activities and tasks. The meeting included discussion of printing bulletins, dues notices, and publicity for the club.

articles.title: San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club Planning Meeting on December 21, 1964
articles.summary: The San Jose Amateur Astronomers Club held a planning meeting on December 21, 1964, to discuss the January 1965 program and possible star-party campsites. The meeting was attended by six members, including May Duggan, Estella Pollack, and Ralph Plankinton.
